subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: U.S. hockey officials will select from a at least a half-dozen candidates three N.H.L. goaltenders who will be on the roster for the Sochi Olympics in February.
snippet: U.S. hockey officials will select from a at least a half-dozen candidates three N.H.L. goaltenders who will be on the roster for the Sochi Olympics in February.
